title: Pheasant kiev, crushed swede, hazelnut butter and smoky bacon cabbage
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz peeled and toasted hazelnuts, plus extra for garnish
115g/4oz smoked pancetta or pancetta, in one piece with skin on
1 large swede, peeled and cut into 2cm/¾in dice
1 small Savoy cabbage, outer leaves removed and retained, inner quartered
salt and freshly ground black pepper
